PSCT.Base:
"The Weather" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zones of this card's column and its adjacent columns gain this effect.
‚óè When exactly 1 card is added to one player's hand (except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card; banish the added card, and if you do, that player draws 1 card.
You can only control 1 "The Weather Auroral Canvas".
